sentences.sentence: There were 83 limbs 9.1% of recurrence of spasticity.
sentences.translation: 术后肢体痉挛状态不同程度复发83例（9.1%）。

sentences.sentence: There were 165 cases (10.83%) of recurrence of spasticity.
sentences.translation: 术后痉挛状态不同程度复发165例（10.83%）。

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the mechanism of spasticity in cerebral palsy (CP).
sentences.translation: 目的：研究痉挛型脑瘫患儿肌痉挛形成的机制。
